chapter.name: bach Tutorial 18: Graphical Synchronization
chapter.subhead: Synchronize domain and zoom with other objects
chapter.body: The bach interfaces can get very useful when their usage interacts with the standard Max object's usage. One can imagine a lot of situations where the notation object can be synchronized with standard objects like functions, bpatchers, and so on. In this tutorial, we show an easy example of how one of these situation can be handled.
